string.value: Thanks to your hard work, Marshall agreed to take the gig. Give #bLana#k the good news.
Lana suggested that you ask #bLala#k, Blake's number one fan, for help with the costumes.
#bLala#k was thrilled to hear that Blake was finally make a debut, and asked you to give her some time to brainstorm.
Well? Did you get Marshall to do Blake's hair?\r\n#L0##bI sure did! I convinced Marshall to help us.#l\n#k

Phew, what a relief! Now, let's see what's next. Let me just check my chart here... Ah! We need to get Blake a costume. A costume is what makes a performance pop! #h0#, are you ready for your next job?
I think we need Lala, Blake's number one fan, to help us on this one. She may be young, but she's got an incredible sense of fashion. Hurry over to #bLala#k.
You must hurry. We don't have much time.
What brings you here? Hm? Really?! Blake is finally making his debut?! Of course I'll take care of his costume, are you kidding?!
Hm, hm, hmmm. I think I need some time to brainstorm. Please come back to see me in a little bit. Tee hee.
Please go see #bLala#k. She should be wearing an adorable school uniform.
